name: Space Wizard: Balls of Doom
description:
SPACE WIZARD: BALLS OF DOOM

Just a small school project that went out of scope and into space. You play as a wizard in space, jumping around on platforms and shooting basketballesque spells at hoops.

Forgot to unlock the cursor when reaching the portal. Oh well, will fix that for an eventual update... 

Most art assets are from the Unity Asset Store, specials thanks to OwlishMedia are however due for the GUI Icons. (GUI Icons "RPG_Icons_Pack_OwlishMedia" from opengameart.org (CC-BY 4.0))
